name: s59_moodgift
description: MoodGIFt is a fun and lighthearted application designed to lift users' spirits by recommending GIFs and memes based on their current mood or emotion. Users can log in, select their current mood from a list of options, and enjoy a selection of memes and GIFs tailored to their chosen mood.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm start"
